title: Happy Birthday, Shizuku!
detail_text: <:th_ch0106/>Happy birthday, Shizuku! Rejoice! For this Yohane has personally come to escort you to the party venue!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Thank you, Yohane-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>It’s not Yoshiko, it’s Yoha.... Eh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Hey, before we go to the party, may I have a bit of your time?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>What is it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>You see, there was that time where we did an improvisational play together, right, Yohane-san? It didn’t go so well at the time due to my inexperience.... I’ve been wanting to do it again, properly this time. So with the help of Setsuna-san, Umi-san, Hanamaru-san, and Shioriko-san, I’ve made a proper script!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Haaah....? Uhh, Yohane isn’t really an act, you know? That’s why I don’t need a script, okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>As expected of Yohane-san....! You can always do it without a script, huh....! I feel ashamed of myself for not being able to bring out my best without a script. But I’ll give it my all, so please, read this! Let’s act it out, together!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>No, that’s why I’m saying.... You’re getting it wrong.... More importantly, everyone is waiting, so let’s just go.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>It can be just for a short while. Act with me! Please give me a birthday present from you, Yohane-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>It’s not fair to bring up presents! Alright, fine! Let’s do it!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
